content: I do not have personal preferences or subjective opinions. however, all of the hot springs mentioned above have beautiful and serene views, depending on the season and the location. for example, hakone onsen and niseko onsen are located in mountainous regions with stunning scenery, while ginzan onsen has a picturesque town setting with a river and forest views. arima onsen is surrounded by lush nature, while yunomine onsen has a unique landscape with steaming hot springs surrounded by a lush forest. ultimately, the best views at a hot spring resort depend on personal preferences and what you want to get out of the experience.
